DOC.brief_summary: Phase III long-term safety study of Effexor XR in patients with major depression.
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating Long-Term Safety of Effexor XR in Patients With Major Depression.
DOC.criteria: Patients who complete the Phase III doubleblind study (Protocol Number 0600B1816) Patients with schizophrenia or any other psychotic disorder Patients with history or presence of bipolar disorder
